name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Hybrid Drop 11 USA Baseball Bat is a game-changer for young players seeking to elevate their performance on the field. With its slightly end-loaded swing feel, this bat offers a perfect blend of speed and power, thanks to its innovative two-piece hybrid construction. The AZR Alloy and multi-variable wall design create an expanded sweet spot, ensuring optimal plate performance and bat responsiveness, while the SDX LT2 connection effectively dampens vibrations for smooth, controlled swings. The eye-catching colorway of sky blue, neon green, and black is matched by advanced features such as the ring-free barrel construction for enhanced flex, a custom knob design for improved feel, and an enhanced soft touch grip for superior control. This USA Baseball Certified bat is ready to make a statement on the field with its 2 5/8-inch barrel diameter and TFX end cap for increased forgiveness. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: Free & Fast Shipping on all orders
Warranty: Full twelve (12) months through the manufacturer
Colorway: Sky blue, neon green, & black
Ring-Free Barrel Construction: Enhances barrel flex & overall bat production
SDX LT2 Connection: Kills vibrations for smooth, controlled swings
AZR Alloy: Ensures optimal plate performance & bat responsiveness
Multi-Variable Wall Design: Expanded sweet spot w/ forgiving barrel walls
TFX End Cap: Softer end cap increases forgiveness
PFX Composite Handle: Engineered by bat drop enhancing speed, power, & feel
Custom Knob Design: Optimized knob shape for each drop for better feel
Enhanced Soft Touch Grip: Enhances feel & control
